content: Î²-Blockers on Discharge From Acute Atrial Fibrillation Are Associated With Decreased Mortality and Lower Cerebrovascular Accidents in Patients With Heart Failure and Reduced Ejection Fraction.Abi Khalil C, Zubaid M, Asaad N, Rashed WA, Hamad AK, Singh R, Al Suwaidi J.Abi Khalil C, et al.Angiology. 2018 Apr;69(4):316-322. doi: 10.1177/0003319717722283. title: Beta-blockers in atrial fibrillation-trying to make sense of unsettling results
reference: Meyer, M., & Lustgarten, D. (2023). Beta-blockers in atrial fibrillation-trying to make sense of unsettling results. Europace, 25(2), 260-262. https://doi.org/10.1093/europace/euad010
